teiHeader.encodingDesc: Full description provided in accompanying thesis 'Methodology' section

extent.measure: About three and three quarters megabytes

objectDesc.note: A manuscript at Plas Bodorgan, Anglesey. Cyfnerth redaction with some missing pages. A facsimile copy is Bangor 21108.

fileDesc.editionStmt: Bespoke encoding of text drawn from Luft, Peter and Smith (2013), ‘Rhyddiaith gymraeg 1300-1425’.URL:http://www.rhyddiaithganoloesol.caerdydd.ac.uk.

teiHeader.profileDesc: This encoding represents the text of Cyfraith Hywel referred to as Mk in the Cyfnerth redaction.
